## Review Schedule

**Quarter:** Q[N] [YEAR]  
**Due Date:** [Date]  
**Reviewer:** @[username]

## Checklist

- [ ] Phase 1: Inventory (30 min)
- [ ] Phase 2: Duplicate Detection (45 min)
- [ ] Phase 3: Content Quality (60 min)
- [ ] Phase 4: Organization Compliance (30 min)
- [ ] Phase 5: Remediation Planning (15 min)
- [ ] Post review report as comment
- [ ] Create cleanup issues
- [ ] Schedule next review

## Review Report

Post your completed review using the template in the [Review Process](../../docs/project-management/DOCUMENTATION_REVIEW.md#review-report-template).
